alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:16PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Madison County through 400 PM MDT... At 315 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Alder, or 11 miles southwest of Sheridan, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Virginia City, Ennis, Alder, Mcallister, Jeffers and Laurin. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 47 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
